title: General Checkup
summary: Routine medical examinations for overall health evaluation.
description: Our general checkup service provides a complete medical examination to assess your overall health. It includes blood pressure monitoring, cholesterol screening, BMI calculation, and basic blood work.

title: Pediatrics
summary: Comprehensive healthcare for infants, children, and adolescents.
description: Our pediatricians are dedicated to the health and well-being of your children. From newborn checkups to developmental screenings, we ensure your child receives the best care.

title: Dental Care
summary: Oral health services including cleaning, fillings, and preventive care.
description: We offer professional dental services including oral exams, cleanings, x-rays, fillings, and fluoride treatments. Our team is committed to helping you maintain a healthy smile.

title: Cardiology
summary: Diagnosis and treatment of heart-related conditions.
description: Our cardiology department provides advanced diagnostics, treatment, and monitoring for a wide range of cardiovascular conditions. Services include EKG, echocardiograms, and stress tests.
